data.blogText: Ferrari 488 Spider is the base petrol variant in the 488 lineup and is priced at Rs. 4.40 crore (ex-showroom, Chirawa). This base variant comes with an engine putting out 659.78bhp@8000rpm and 760Nm@6750 rpm of max power and max torque respectively. The gasoline motor comes mated to 7 Speed Automatic transmission which is quite a joy to use. Ferrari claims an average of 7.8 kmpl for this base Spider variant.

Land Rover has launched the 2020 Range Rover Evoque with prices starting from Rs 54.94 lakh to Rs 59.85 lakh (ex-showroom). It is offered with a single diesel engine option and in two trim levels. The 2.0-litre diesel motor develops 180PS and 430Nm. Itâ€™s offered with an all-wheel drive system and 9-speed automatic transmission.

The Corolla Altis was retailed between Rs. 16.46 lakh and Rs. 20.20 lakh (ex-showroom), and it used 1.8-litre petrol and 1.4-litre diesel engines. ... The five-seater could go on sale in April 2020 with a slightly modified exterior and a 1.5-litre four-cylinder SHVS petrol engine kicking out 104.7 PS and 138 Nm.

In its third iteration, the Ford Escape is based on the C2 platform which also underpins the Ford Focus hatchback range. The styling of the Escape resembles its siblings in India. A wide trapezoidal honeycomb grille designed similar to the one seen on the Ford hatchback here.The headlamp assembly houses a twin projector setup with sharp LED DRLs. The stance of the Escape is high, however, its compact design language gives it a more crossover-like appearance. The rear has wrap-around tail lamps and the Escape gets twin exhaust tips.

The City comes with equipment like a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, an 8-speaker sound system, automatic climate control, leather upholstery as well as cruise control. Safety features consist of dual front airbags,side and curtain airbags as well as ABS+EBD. As far as safety is concerned, the City now gets reverse parking sensors as standard equipment. All other variants, save for the top-spec ZX get dual airbags and ABS as standard. In the top model, you get side and curtain airbags additionally.
